name: Varus Ventures
overview: Varus Ventures, LLC is a provider of early stage capital to public and private entities in the Mid-Atlantic region and beyond. The Varus Team has extensive experience in financial services, franchising, manufacturing, healthcare services and software/IT sectors. Varus invests between $500,000 to $4.0 million in a single portfolio company. They often take a lead role, though this is not a requirement. They may invest alongside strong investor syndicates with sufficient capital to fund the business until a liquidity event is possible. Varus has Limited Partners with strong industry experience who are active contributors to their deal flow. Their Limited Partners include prominent CEOs, Entrepreneurs, Attorneys and Bankers nationwide. Varus employs an active management style and seeks opportunities where they can create and add value in support of the management team.
